defects.title: Manual distances ignored when templates also define ranges
defects.description: If a tester records axis distances inside a test case, the report and comparison views continue to show the template's "must not respond" range instead of the recorded override, making it impossible to validate the actual field measurements.

defects.title: Comparison cards hide axis context
defects.description: When an execution is added to the comparison dashboard with a specific axis filter, the card never shows which axis/direction or distance bounds were applied. Reviewers cannot tell why runs fail without opening the original test case.

defects.title: Defect register search ignores IDs and severities
defects.description: The defect register only filters on titles/descriptions. QA cannot quickly isolate Critical defects or look up tickets by their ID, forcing manual scans of long lists.

defects.title: Requirement Templates
defects.description: Clicking "Manage Templates" in Pass/Fail Requirements shows a blank page and removes the input data from Test Case.

defects.title: Test Case too noisy
defects.description:
Test Case information are always shown together with Test Execution information, but user has to tune it out. It's necessary information for the test case, but for the test execution it's visual noise. 
- Group Test Case information together and get it a bit out of the way to put focus on test execution details.
- Make it obvious what is Test Case information and what is Test Execution information

defects.title: Add Comparison->New view
defects.description:
Clicking on "Compare Axis" takes user to Compare view forcing user to navigate back to the Test Execution and selecting the next Axis. If all 6 axis are to be compared for multiple test executions, this is too exhausting. 

When adding a TEst Execution to comparisson, prompt user which axis they want to compare. Make it selectable in Comparison as well (checkboxes)

defects.title: Comparison View
defects.description:
Comparison should be a view allowing to easily compare results of similar test executions and test cases.
Update Comparison to better fit into this mandate.

defects.title: Select for comparison
defects.description: The Add to comparison button is placed in the head by the import/export buttons - This should be a Test execution specific button. Or Test Case and then select which test executions to add to comparison

defects.title: Importing data to existing execution
defects.description: When importing data allow for it to be added to existing test execution. If data already exist in the selected execution, prompt to append the data, overwrite or cancel (allowing to create a new execution instead)

defects.title: Copy Test Case Details
defects.description: Add function to duplicate Test Case including Test Case information. Prompt if user want's to duplicate Test Execution data as well

defects.title: Copy Test Execution detailes
defects.description: Allow copying test details like Pass/Fail Requirements, Execution Hardware when Creating new test executions inside a test case.
